lb:
During an [Airstrike], all Squadrons will launch 10 more planes.
Coward upgraded to Level 2.

Bombers will drop their payloads before being engaged by enemy Anti-Air fire.
Gets the Job Done upgraded to Level 2.

During Day Battle, increases all damage by 30%.
Coward upgraded to Level 3.

Increases aircraft reserves for all categories by 50 aircraft each.
Gets the Job Done upgraded to Level 3.

During Day Battle, gains the ability to launch an [Airstrike] immediately that deals 50% damage. This attack will not incur any plane loss.
Coward upgraded to Level 4.

skills.name: Class Skill
skills.text:
Airstrikes: Can launch attacks from the map and in battle, has infinite range, reload time when used on map: 60s in battle: 25
Reconnaissance: Planes can be sent when on the map to reveal the fog of war, reload time: 10s

skills.name:
Hunter of the Skies
空の狩人
text: During battle, if [Airstrike] hits and there is only one ship left in the enemy fleet, the attack deals 100% more damage.Can only activate once per battle
The higher the enemy's HP, the more [Airstrike] damage Franklin deals, up to 20%.

skills.name:
Will of the Society
ソサエティの意志
text: During battle, when Franklin launches an airstrike, she gives 2 "Will of the Society" stacks to your fleet. When an enemy is sunk and your fleet has Will of the Society stacks, one stack will be consumed to deal 50% Franklin's Firepower to the enemy fleet attacked.

skills.name:
Force in Numbers
数の暴力
text: When starting a quest, 30 planes of each type will be added to the hangar
When launching an airstrike, Franklin's damage is increased by a maximum of 20% depending on the number of ships participating in the airstrike.

comment: Looks mature, hates adventures and thinks conservatively. Firm believer that your force needs to be three times that the enemy to win. Although there aren't many people who read while running on a treadmill, this woman does. There are stories where she has once overheated a running machine because she was too absorbed in a book.
